post:
HostFurious was established in 2014 in looking to provide customers with high quality hosting and support. We understand that anything from a small personal blog to a mission-critical business site needs to be accessible and fast 24 hours a day. We continue to expand and grow bigger everyday which is the key of our success. At HostFurious, we keep everything at a very affordable price while maintaining our hosting qualities and expectations high. All of our servers uses RAID to maintain your important data with high redundancy and premium networks for quick loading speeds. No one should pay hefty unnecessary prices for services which is one of the many reasons why our customers choose us. We keep a high uptime promise at 99.9% and if it goes below that, you will get compensated. If you aren't completely satisfied with our hosting we offer a thirty days money back guarantee regardless of reason! You can now try our services worry free!

Get a 66% Reccuring discount on our hosting plans monthly or yearly! Enter coupon code: 66%OFF

What Makes You Guys So Great?
* 24x7x365 USA Based Technical Support with real people on the phone
* Enterprise Grade Servers in an Enterprise Grade Datacenter
* Cloud-Based Web Hosting with CloudLinux.com and CloudFlare.com
* Daily R1soft CDP Backups for enterprise data integrity
* One of the most well respected FFMpeg Hosting Providers
* Highly Optimized Apache/NginX for fastest speeds on
* SpamExperts Software for the ultimate in spam protection

When you aren't certain which web hosting option best suits you our competent and professional sales team will help you with your requirements. HostFurious also provides added offers and the expertise for seamless upgrades as your organization expands. Remember that the chief aim of our company is not just to sell you our product, our central objective is customer satisfaction.
--Domain name is not included on this offer.

Moving from another host?
No worries! We've got you covered. After signup just fill out our transfer form and we'll transfer over your existing cPanel account from your current host with all data intact and no website downtime usually within a few hours.

Do you have FFmpeg Hosting?
Yes we fully support FFmpeg Hosting. Our Hosting is fully compatible with scripts like Clip-Share, PHPmotion and more! Our server limits allow you and your visitors to upload large videos and stream them at amazing speeds with our fast network and optimized servers.

Are your servers fast and reliable?
Our philosophy leads us to believe the value in hosting lies in retaining clients, therefore we spend more money on providing top of the line support and maintaining our servers to keep everything in tip top shape. We chose a very fast and reliable datacenter to house our servers in. In addition we hire only the best technicians who are available 24 hours a day, 7 days to assist you for whatever your need.

Is my data safe with you?
We employ daily website backups, so we'll always have a daily, weekly and monthly backup of your account. Backups can be restored at anytime by a simple support ticket request. The servers are run in a high security datacenter, protected by an uninterruptible power supply system.


➛ Payment Via PayPal & 2CheckOut. Orders will typically be processed within 48 hours after verification.

Thanking you.
